time-based version. Integrates "stamina" and "fatigue" features into a single feature. Currently, player matches in denom factored 4th root, based on some prediction quality feedbck from simple (linear) model. It's a little counterintuitive, but a higher number indicates more "wear" on the battery (df_player1["p_tot_time_l7d_tw"])/(df_player1["p_matches_nss"]**(1/4))
